string.name: connect_settings_summary
string.Data: "Gano na'urorin da ke kusa ta atomatik da aka sanya hannu a cikin Asusun Xiaomi din ku kuma ku haɗa su da juna don aiwatar da ayyuka iri-iri a cikin na'urori da yawa. Karin bayani"

resources.string: "Bada izini na'urorin ku suyi hulɗa da juna ba tare da waya ba"
Amsa kira akan tablet din kusa ko kwamfutoci da aka sanya hannu a Asusun Xiaomi din ku
"Gano na'urorin da ke kusa da aka shiga cikin Asusunku na Xiaomi kuma ƙara su zuwa Xiaomi Smart Hub"
"Wannan fasalin yana koyon zanen sirrin ku kuma yana amfani da su don sarrafa na'urorin gida masu wayo. Mi AI ne ke ƙarfafa shi."
"Ci gaba da ayyuka a cikin manhaja iri ɗaya akan wata na'urar"
"Manna rubutu da hotuna zuwa wasu na'urori a cikin mintuna %d bayan kwafa su akan wannan na'urar."
Duba ku yi hulɗa tare da Allon farko na wayoyin da ke kusa da aka sa hannu zuwa Asusun Xiaomi din ku
"Bada izini ma su tablet da kwamfutoci da ke kusa don dubawa da hulda tare da Allon farkon wannan na'urar"
Karɓi sanarwa daga wayoyin da ke kusa da aka sanya hannu zuwa Asusun Xiaomi din ku
"Nuna sanarwa akan tablet na kusa ko kwamfutoci da ake amfani da su lokacin da wannan na'urar ke kulle"
"Ka na iya ci gaba da shirya wasa idan allon na'urarka na kashe. Wannan siffar na rage yawan cin wutar batir."
Kar a nuna sanarwa dake bambarowa, kiran dake shigowa, da wasu abubuwa na sirri akan allo na waje
Rage girman tagar da ake yada wasa a kai saboda ka iya amfani da wasu siffofi akan wayarka
"Na'urar tana aiki. Jira minti daya ko biyu kuma a sake gwadawa."
"Bayan haka, wannan na'urar za ta iya amfani da kyamara akan %s don ɗaukar hotuna da rikodin bidiyoyi."
Akan %s, jeka cikin Saittuna > Haɗe haden > Haɗe haden da izini kuma ba da izinin kyamara.
Akan %s, Jeka cikin Saittuna > Sistem > Sarrafa manhaja > Izini na musamman > Haɗe haden sai ba da izinin kyamara.
Ba da izini ma watsawa akan TV ka da farko
Ya kasa ba da izinin watsawa akan TV ka. Jira minti daya ko biyu sai ka gwada kuma.
Wannan manhajar na buƙatar isa ga wurinku don samun monita na waje a kusa. Zaɓi \"Bada izinin koyaushe\" yayin ba da wannan izinin don kauce wa kurakurai da ke iya faruwa.

"Bada izinin Watsa midiya don yin rikodin sauti, isowa ga fayiloli a cikin ma'ajin ciki, da isowa ga wurin ku don samun damar yin amfani da wannan siffar a koyaushe. Taba \"Saittuna\" kuma zaɓi \"Izinin manhaja\" don ka ci gaba."
"Bada izini ma wannan na'urar don shiga na'urorin da ke kusa don samun damar yin amfani da fasalulluka na shirya wasa."

"Fasalin hade hade na Xiaomi da kuke amfani da shi yana buƙatar izini don haɗawa zuwa na'urori da ke kusa. Idan ba tare da shi ba, wannan fasalin ba zai iya aiki akai-akai ba. Kuna iya ba da wannan izini a cikin Saittuna."
Turn on WLAN to be able to cast using NFC. Turn on now?

string.name: dialog_no_device_message
string.Data:
%1$d. Haɗa wayoyinka guda biyu da TV akan hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya.

%2$d. A kan wasu irin TV, wannan yanayin yana samuwa ne kawai idan madubin allon na kunne. Duba \"Taimako\" don ƙarin koyo

string.name: dialog_no_device_message_china
string.Data:
%1$d. Connect both your mobile device and TV to the same WLAN network.

%2$d. On some TV models, this feature is only available when screen mirroring is on. View \"Help\" to learn more.

string.name: global_privacy_detail
string.Data:
Karanta kuma ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai amfani da Sharuddan Bayanai kafin amfani da wannan manhajar.
Idan baku yarda da amfani da ayyukan da aka ambata ba, ba za ku iya amfani da wasu abubuwan wannan manhajar ba; duk da haka, aikinsa na asali zai kasance a gare ku.

resources.string: Barka da zuwa Shirya wasa! Wannan manhajar yana samar da ayyuka masu zuwa:
Amfani da ƙananan windows, shirya wasa tare da allo a kashe, da ɓoye abubuwa masu zaman kansu.
Haskaka abubuwan daga allon wayarka a kan babban allo na waje.

"Yayin yin rikodi ko yin shirya wasa, sabis ɗin da ke samar da wannan fasalin zai iya ɗaukar kowane mahimman bayanai waɗanda ke nunawa akan allonku ko kunnawa daga na'urar ku, gami da mahimman bayanai kamar sauti, kalmomin shiga, bayanan biyan kuɗi, hotuna, da saƙonni."

string.name: global_privacy_tip
string.Data: Muna buƙatar tattara keɓaɓɓun bayanan sirri don samar muku da ayyukan yau da kullun da inganta aikin watsawar midiya. Kuna iya koyon yadda muke sarrafa bayanan da muka tattara a cikin Sharuddan Bayanai. Kuna iya janye izinin ku ga Dokar Sirri a cikin Saituna kowane lokaci.

resources.string: Yada wasa da allon a kashe
"Ci gaba da shirya wasa idan allon na'urarka na kashe. Wannan siffar na rage yawan cin batir. Danna madannin kunnawan ka sake kunna allon."
Yana yada wasa da allon a kashe…
"An haɗa na'urar jin sauti da wannan na'urar. Danna sau biyu don kunnawa. Danna da yatsu biyu kuma jawo don aika bugawa."

"%1$d. Idan da na'urar da kuke shirya wasa Xiaomi TV ce, kunna Miracast akanta. %2$d. Idan na'urar da kuke shirya wasa ba ta Xiaomi TV ba ce, tabbatar cewa TV ta dace da Miracast kuma an kunna wannan fasalin. Wannan fasalin yana iya samun suna daban-daban akan wasu nau'ikan TV, kamar nunawa mara waya, Madubin allo, ko fuska mai yawa."
%1$d. Wasu band na TV na iya kunna Miracast ta atomatik.
%1$d. Kunna Miracast akan Xiaomi TV ɗin ku.
Shirya wasa shine haskaka abubuwa daga allon wayarka zuwa kan wata baban monita na waje. Yana ba ka damar rabar da hotuna da bidiyoyi da abokanka da iyalanka ba tare da amfani da data mobayil ba.
Yaya ake yada wasa akan allon babban allo?
"Mataki na %1$d: Duba na'urorinku da yanayin hanyar sadarwa"
"Mataki na %1$d: Duba na'urorinku da yanayin hanyar sadarwa"

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, set-top boxes, projectors: Connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network for best effect. If they are connected to different networks, it might take more time to find the external monitor and connect. Note: Older TV models might not support casting across different networks. %2$d. If you're using TVs, set-top boxes, or projectors of other brands, connect both your mobile device and external monitor to the same WLAN network. If the two devices can't be connected to the same network, turn on Miracast on your external monitor. The naming of Miracast functionality might vary."

"%1$d. Xiaomi TVs, Mi Boxes, da Mi projectors: Ka haɗa na'urar ka da allon kwanfutarka ta waje zuwa hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi don kyakkyawan sakamako. Idan sun hadu zuwa hanyoyin sadarwa daban-daban, zai iya ɗaukar lokaci mai tsawo kafin a sami allon kwanfutarka sai ka hada. Kula: tsofaffin Mi TV na iya kasa aiki da shirya wasa na hanyoyin sadarwa. %2$d Idan kana amfani da TVs, akwatunan set-top, ko furojekta na wasu daban, haɗa da na'urar ka da allon kwamfutarka ta waje zuwa hanyar sadarwa Wi-Fi ɗayan. Idan na'urorinka guda biyun su ka kasa hadawa da hanyar sadarwa dayan, kunna Miracast a kan allon kwamfutarka ta waje. Sunan na ayyukan Miracast na iya bambanta."
Xiaomi TVs, akwatunan saiti, da frojekta:

"%1$d. Tabbatar cewa na'urar tafi da gidanka da na'urar duba waje suna haɗe zuwa hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya. %2$d. A kan wasu TV na Xiaomi, zaku iya saita shirya wasa daga TV tare da tsara hanyoyin bincike da tantance na'urar."
* Kuna iya saita zaɓin shirya wasa don TV ɗinku a cikin saittunan shirya wasa.
TV da ba na Xiaomi ba, akwatunan saiti, da frojekta:
"%1$d. Tabbatar cewa na'urar mobayil dinka da monita na waje suna haɗe zuwa hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya. %2$d. A kan wasu nau'ikan TV, kuna buƙatar kunna Miracast don samun damar yada wasa."
"Tap the \"Cast\" toggle on your phone's Notification shade. Turn on both WLAN and Bluetooth for a more stable connection."
"Taba maballi '' Yada wasa'' akan inuwar sanarwa na na'urarka. Kunna Wi-Fi da Bluetooth dun hadawar intanit yayi kyau."
"Kunna shirya wasaa cikin Santar sarrafa na'urar ku, sannan nemo na monita na waje."
Idan kuna son jefa hotuna, bidiyo, wasanni, ko gabatarwa, zaku iya amfani da fasalulluwar shirya wasa gyare-gyare a cikin manhajar da suka dace.
"Zabi wata na'ura na waje daga jerin na'urorin da akwai don ka fara shirya wasa."
"Zabi wata na'ura na waje daga jerin na'urorin da akwai don ka fara shirya wasa."
"Bai iya hadawa da na'ura na waje?"

"%1$d. Tabbatar cewa na'urar mobayil dinka da monita na waje suna haɗe zuwa hanyar sadarwar Wi-Fi iri ɗaya ko hotspot. %2$d. Tabbatar cewa mahallin hanyar sadarwa ya tabbata. Idan ba haka ba, gwada sake kunna na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin sadarwa ko canza zuwa sadarwar %3$d GHz band. %4$d. Lokacin yin shirya wasa zuwa TV na Xiaomi, kunna fasalin shirya wasa mara waya akan TV. Tsaya kan shafin yin wasan kwaikwayo yayin da ake haɗawa. %5$d. Wasu manyan LAN na jama'a kamar na kamfanoni da makarantu ba sa goyan bayan ikon gano na'urori akan LAN iri ɗaya."

"Wasu TVs suna amfani da haɗin da ba na LAN ba yayin yin shirya wasa. Yana da al'ada don cire haɗin waɗannan na'urori daga hanyar sadarwa. Yawancin lokaci za su sake haɗawa a cikin sakan %1$d-%2$d bayan shirya wasa ya kare."
"Bai iya hadawa da na'ura na waje"
Katsewar hanyar sadarwa yayin yin simintin shirya wasa

"%1$d. If you want to use a Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If there aren't any networks available or you can't connect both devices to the same network, check whether the casting features on your external monitor are up to date, turn on Bluetooth both on your mobile device and the external monitor, and turn on Miracast on your TV. %2$d. If you're casting on a Xiaomi device for the first time, you need to complete verification. %3$d. If you want to use a non-Xiaomi device, but can't find it in the list of available devices, try the following: Connect both your mobile device and the external monitor (e.g. your TV) to the same network, or connect the external monitor to your mobile device's hotspot. If this doesn't help, install the HappyCast app on your TV and follow the instructions."

"%1$d. Idan ka an amfani da na'urra Xiaomi, amma ka kasa samun sa a cikin jerin na'urorin da akwai, gwada wadannan: Hada na'urarka da monita na wajen (misali TV ka) da Wi-Fi dayan, ko ka hada monita na waje da hotspot din na'urarka. Idan babu sadarwar Wi-Fi ko kuma bai iya hada na'urori biyun akan hanyar sadarwa dayan, bincika ko siffofin shirya wasa dake akan monitan ka na waje na daidai da rana, kunna Bluetooth akan na'urarka da monitar na waje, sai ka kunna Miracast akan TV ka. %2$d. Idan kana watsawa akan na'urar Xiaomi a karo na fari, dole ka kammala tabbatarwa. %3$d. Idan kana son ka yi amfani da na'urar da ba na Xiaomi ba, amma ka kasa samu sa a cikin jerin na'urorin da akwai, gwada wadannan: Hada na'urarka da monita na wajen (misali TV ka) da Wi-Fi dayan, ko ka hada monita na waje da hotspot din na'urarka."
"Aiki na Miracast akan na'urori daba daban"

"Kana iya haskaka abubuwa daga wayarka ta Xiaomi zuwa kowane irin Xiaomi TV masu aiki da Bluetoothn ba tare da kunnawan Miracast da kanka ba. Idan ka na neman kunna Miracast, danna madanin [MENU] sai ka zabi manhaja > Shirya wasa > Miracast."

Kuna iya tsara abubuwa daga wayar Xiaomi akan yawancin samfuran Xiaomi TV tare da damar Bluetooth ba tare da kunna Miracast da kamka ba. Idan kana buƙatar kunna Miracast, danna maɓallin [MENU] kuma fara shirya wasa ta amfani da zaɓi don wasu wayoyin Android.

"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ya dace akan na'urarka. Akan wasu iri, kana iya danna madanin [SOURCE] a kan ramut sai ka zabi '' Madubin Allo''. Wanna siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Wannan siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."
"Na farko, tabbatar cewa aikin Miracast ta dace da na'urarka. Wannan siffar na kunne a asali akan iri da yawa."

First, make sure that Miracast functionality is supported on your device. On some of the models, you can press the [SOURCE] button on the remote control and then select \"Screen Mirroring\". On some other models, you can turn this feature on in Networks > WLAN Direct. This feature is turned on by default on various models.

string.name: privacy_detail_extra
string.Data: HappyCast ke bada sabisin wasu siffofi. Kafin amfani da wannan siffar, karanta kuma ka amince da Sharuudan Bayanan HappyCast da Bayanan doka na HappyCast.

resources.string: Barka da zuwa Shirya wasa! Watsawa yana ba da izinin aiwatar da abubuwan daga allon wayarka akan babban monita na waje. Wannan manhajar yana buƙatar haɗi zuwa intanet kuma yana buƙatar izini masu izini don iya yin aiki na yau da kullun:
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"
"Na gano na'urorin da akwai a kusa"
Waɗannan izini ana buƙatar su ne don siffofi na asali da sabis su kasance akwai.
"Na hadawar na'urori ta hanyar amfani da NFC"
An yi amfani dashi ma karin siffofi yayin da kuke amfani dasu
"Isowa da ajiye abubuwa a cikin ma'aji"
"Isowa da ajiye fayiloli da haotuna da aka ajiye akan na'urarka"

"Yayin yin rikodi ko yin shirya wasa, sabis ɗin da ke samar da wannan fasalin zai iya ɗaukar kowane mahimman bayanai waɗanda ke nunawa akan allonku ko kunnawa daga na'urar ku, gami da mahimman bayanai kamar sauti, kalmomin shiga, bayanan biyan kuɗi, hotuna, da saƙonni."

string.name: privacy_phone_read_theme_privacy_policy
string.Data: Na karanta kuma na amince da Sanarwa \"Sanarwa kan Janyewar izini na Sharuddan Bayanan hade hade na Xiaomi\".

resources.string: Amince da dukan sharudda da yanayin da farko

"%1$d. Tabbatar cewa kana da damar janye izini kafin ka ci gaba. %2$d. Bayan ka janyewar izini, bayanan sirri da aka riga aka tattara da kuma adana za a share su a cikin takamaiman lokacin daidai da dokoki da ƙa'idodi sai dai idan an buƙata. Kamar yadda ake ba da sabis na haɗin kai dangane da tarin mahimman bayanan sirri, janye izininku za a riƙe shi azaman ƙin karɓar sabis na haɗin kai. Janye yardar ku ba zai shafi amfanin yau da kullun na wasu siffofi da ayyuka ba. %3$d. Janyewar izini mataki ne da ba za a iya juyawa ba. Ka tuna cewa ba za ka iya sake yin la'akari da shawararka ba da zarar an janyewar izinin ka."
Sanarwa kan Janyewar izini na Sharuddan Bayanan hade hade na Xiaomi
Karanta kuma ka yarda da \"Sanarwa kan Janyewar izini da Sharuddan Bayanai na Hade hade na Xiaomi\" kafin janye izininka.

Idan kun ci gaba, zaku janye izinin ku zuwa Sharuddan Bayanan Hade hade na Xiaomi. Za a share bayananka na sirri da aka riga aka tattara da kuma adana a cikin takamaiman lokacin daidai da dokoki da manhaja sai dai idan an buƙata. Kamar yadda ake ba da sabis na haɗin kai dangane da tarin mahimman bayanan sirri, janyewar izininku za a riƙe shi azaman ƙin karɓar sabis na haɗin kai. Janyewar izinin ku ba zai shafi amfanin yau da kullun na wasu fasaloli da sabis ba.

Ba za ku iya ci gaba da amfani da fasalulluka na shirya wasa gyare-gyare ba sai kun ba mu damar samar da ayyukanmu dangane da tarin mahimman bayanan sirri. Janye izini ga sharuddan bayanai HappyCast ko ta yaya?

"Idan kuka ci gaba, za ku janye amincewar ku zuwa Sharuddan Bayanai na HappyCast. Za a share bayanan sirri da aka riga aka tattara kuma aka riƙe su a cikin takamaiman lokacin daidai da dokoki da ƙa'idodi sai dai idan an buƙaci hakan. Yayin da HappyCast ke ba da sabis ɗinsa dangane da tattara bayanan sirri da ake buƙata, za a riƙe janyewar ku a matsayin ƙin karɓar sabis ɗin HappyCast. Janyewar izini yanzu?"
Janyewar izini ga Sharuddan Bayanai na HappyCast

string.name: privacy_text_1
string.Data: "Barka da zuwa Watsawa! Watsawa na ba da izinin haskaka abubuwa daga allon wayar ka zuwa wata babban allo na monita. Dole mu kare bayananka na sirri bisa ga dokoki da ka'idodi, da sharuddan bayanai. Wata kamfanin ba da sabis sabis daban na HappyCast ke ba da siffofi. Kafin amfani dasu, karanta kuma ka amince da Bayanan Doka ta HappyCast da Sharuddan Bayanan HappyCast. Don ya iya aiki daidai, wannan manhajar na iya hadawa da intanit kuma ya bukaci wadannan izini domin ya tattara bayananka na sirri:"

string.name: privacy_text_2
string.Data: "Idan ba ka yarda ka ba da wannan izini ba ko rabarwa da aika bayananka na sirri, ba zaka iya amfani da wannan manhajar ba. Kana iya zabar ka cire wannan manhaja, fita daga ciki, ko takaita izini a cikin Saittuna a irin wadannan lokuta. Karanta kuma ka amince da Yarjejjeniyar Mai Amfanin mu da Sharuddan Bayanan mu kafin amfani da wannan siffar>"
